original_text: Hiram had sailors who knew how to sail ships on the sea. He sent some of these men to work with Solomon's sailors.
korean_text: 히람이 자기 종 곧 바다에 익숙한 사공들을 솔로몬의 종과 함께 그 배로 보내매

sentences.original_text: who knew how to sail ships on the sea
He sent some of these men
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이这些人 중 일부를 보냈으며
